Antharas Watchman Theodric:
I am Theodric, the Antharas Watchman.
My calling is to watch Antharas, the accursed son of Shilen. I make sure he never wakes up, as that would put the whole world again on the brink of destruction. For the sake of my mission, I gave my soul to the Darkness and turned into undead.
Previously the Antharas' Nest was hidden in deep caves, and it was not easy to get to it. But now Antharas has settled here, in the Dragon Valley.
My mission has lost any meaning now, I don't need the Portal Stone anymore. And I don't know how to continue fulfilling my duty...
